definitions: a point or place of crossing from one side to the other.
shortDefinitions: point or place of crossing from one side to other

definitions: a short length of track joining two adjacent railroad lines.
shortDefinitions: short length of track joining two adjacent railroad lines

definitions: the process of achieving success in a different field or style, especially in popular music
shortDefinitions: process of achieving success in different field or style

definitions: relating to or denoting trials of medical treatment in which experimental subjects and control groups are exchanged after a set period
shortDefinitions: of trials of medical treatment in which experimental subjects and control groups are exchanged after set period

definitions: a person who votes for a candidate in a different political party than the one they usually support
shortDefinitions: person who votes for candidate in different political party than one
